alert.note: Alert for Luce (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 23 at 10:48AM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Tahquamenon River near Paradise affecting Luce County. .Runoff from recent rain and snow melt will continue to cause high river flows. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Elevated river levels caused by rain and snowmelt continue. * WHERE...Tahquamenon River near Paradise. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The river exceeds bankfull stage * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by Monday afternoon at 200 PM EDT.
